meanings.definition: A set of forms taken by a verb to indicate the time of the action or state it expresses.
meanings.sent1: Understanding different tenses helps us know when actions happen.
meanings.sent2: She studies the tenses in English grammar class.
meanings.sent3: The tenses in the story made the plot easy to follow.
meanings.sent4: The tenses acted like signposts guiding the reader through time.
meanings.sent5: Practice using tenses regularly to improve your language skills.

meanings.definition: A grammatical category that locates a situation in time, to indicate when the situation takes place.
meanings.sent1: The teacher explained the importance of tenses in writing.
meanings.sent2: He struggled with understanding the different tenses in French.
meanings.sent3: The tenses in the sentence had a party to decide who comes first.
meanings.sent4: In the play of words, tenses danced gracefully on the stage of time.
meanings.sent5: The tenses painted a vivid picture of the past, present, and future.
